welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chalatenango, where vibrant culture and stunning natural beauty await you. Known for its charming towns and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's rich history and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free. Network name and password can be found on signs throughout the terminal.
